Message.Msg: Barry has a few more moves before this is all played out. My wife is a Teacher who works with illegal aliens. Even my wife feels it is terrible that these people are jumping ahead of those who applied for citizenship fairly. And the women co-workers have really noticed Paul Ryan. Attractive, smart, and fair. Willing to stop scaring seniors, as opposed to the scare tatics Obama is using.

That would be bad but not the worst. That would be if the Dems dump Obama and nominate Hillary. With the movie "2016" gaining popularity (soon in over 1000 theaters) and with the DVD "Dreams From My REAL Father" being mailed to every home in America, I think we can expect a big drop in the polls before the Democratic Convention. The Democrats don't want to loose and Hillary would be harder to beat.

Today on WCBM radio, here in Baltimore, a middle aged lady covered some of the medicare changes coming soon, while dealing with her sick Mom. She got a warning, a heads up being a hospital employee. It becomes effective October 1. This will definitely destroy the finances of many elderly in their final days. Say your Mom is admitted to the hospital for congestive heart failure, gets better, and is released. The next time she is brought in for the same problem, medicare will not cover it. The reasoning is, you aren't doing enough to prevent reoccuring problems with your health. Therefore Obama punishes you. This will cause some seniors to just stay home and suffer silently, passing at home. More likely in pain. How does Barry, Nancy Pelosi, and the crafters of this legislation sleep at night. You would think at the minimum, they'd at least give pain meds to these poor people.

I'm predicting that Barry will temporarily stop all mail till after the election. This Exective Order will be entitled, save money mailing movies, watch Oprah reruns. Barry will declare a postal, fiscal emegency, stopping this movie from arriving at your doorstep, at all costs.

It's pretty simple if you follow the evidence trail. Barry is accusing Ryan of cutting the program, SS & medicare. However, Barry knows he will have to cut it even more. Why? Cause he wants to redistribute your retirement wealth to Jose, who just popped across the border last week. Make no mistake, the entitlements you earned all these years will wind up in the illegal alien accounts. The ammo, is just in case you head to your local SS office, wondering why your check isn't coming , cause you are already getting a pension from work. Or, Barry found out you got an IRA, or two.

The reason may be for an anticipated shortage due to gun sales surging. They are surging because Obama has Hillary ready to sign on to the un small arms treaty which will take away the right to own a handgun . So people are buying guns now in anticipation of this . Thus the government doesn't want to run out of ammo supplies.
